sentences.en: Agent Starling, how did you track Buffalo Bill here?
sentences.cn: 史达琳探员, 你怎么追查到水牛比尔在这里的?

sentences.en: Are you paying attention to me, ex - Special Agent Starling?
sentences.cn: 卸任的 史黛琳 探员你在听我说话 吗 ?

sentences.en: Clarice Starling : Do right , and youSpoken like a true Protestant.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 说得像个真正的新教徒.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling : Do right and you'll live through this.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 老实点你会经受住的.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling : Do right, and you will live through this.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 老实点, 你会经受住的.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling : No. No, you ate yours.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 不对, 你把那些都吃了.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling: And one morning, I just ran away.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 一天早晨, 我只是出走了.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling: And they were screaming.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 还有它们在号叫.
克拉丽斯: 很早, 天还没亮.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling: I heard a strange noise.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 我听到奇特的声音.

sentences.en: Clarice Starling: Lambs . The lambs were screaming.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽斯: 羔羊们在号叫.
克拉丽斯: 他们杀了他.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Why do you think he removes their skins, Agent Starling?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 你为什么认为他给他们剥了皮, 斯塔琳特工?

sentences.en: What do you do when you're not detecting , Agent Starling?
sentences.cn: 斯达琳探员,你不查案时会做什么?

sentences.en: Why do you think he removes their skins, Agent Starling?
sentences.cn: 他剥了他们的皮为什么要这样?史达琳探员?

words.tran_cn: 桥墩尖端分水桩；挡水木桩；燕八哥；[鸟]欧椋鸟

trans.tran_en: a common bird with shiny black feathers that lives especially in cities
